channel.title: Noel & Tricia Richard on UESI SongBook

item.title: All Heavens Declare the Glory of the Risen Lord
item.description: Psalms 19:1 All heavens declare, the glory of the risen Lord Who can compare with the beauty of the risen Lord Forever, He will be, the Lamb upon the throne, I gladly bow my knee and worship Him alone. I will proclaim the glory of the risen Lord, Who once was slain to reconcile man to God Forever, you will be, the Lamb upon the throne, I gladly bow my knee and worship you
